list-item.p: The barks extracts show some promising results after been exposed at 24 h and 48 h to methanol and aqueous extracts of C. siamea.
The worms were paralysed, and become non-active and at the higher concentration, it kills the worms.

The first ever report demonstrating the use of Cassia siamea against C. elegans expands the knowledge on the usage of C. siamea and indirectly can reduced the usage of the drug for the treatment of the nematodes.
